title: Ex-Capitol Police Officer Found Guilty of Obstruction in Jan. 6 Case
description: A jury found that the man, Michael A. Riley, 51, had deleted Facebook messages in which he offered advice to a Jan. 6 rioter about how to avoid getting caught, prosecutors said.
dc:creator: Vimal Patel
category: Riley, Michael A (US Capitol Police Officer)

media:content.media:credit: Tom Williams/Roll Call, via Getty Images
media:content.media:description: Officer Michael Riley outside Capitol Police headquarters after being named Officer of the Month for February 2011 by the National Law Enforcement Officers Memorial Fund. He was convicted Friday of obstruction of justice in connection with the Jan. 6 riot.
